casebody.data:
Mark HEINONEN
v.
Wallace I. GUPTON, et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided September 20, 2017

Mark Heinonen, self-represented, in support of the petition.

Leslie A. Link, in opposition.

The plaintiff's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 173 Conn.App. 54, 162 A.3d 70 (2017), is denied.
